subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: This section describes properties that configure the ButtonGroup UI component's contents, behavior and appearance.

subMembers.name: buttonComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [buttonTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: buttonRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [buttonTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: buttonTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a template for all the buttons in the group.

subMembers.name: keyExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies which data field provides keys used to distinguish between the selected buttons.

subMembers.name: selectedItemKeys
subMembers.description: Contains keys of selected buttons and allows you to specify initial button selection state.

subMembers.name: selectedItems
subMembers.description: Contains the data objects that correspond to the selected buttons. The data objects are taken from the [items] array.

subMembers.name: stylingMode
subMembers.description: Specifies how buttons in the group are styled.

properties.name: dxButtonGroup
properties.description: The ButtonGroup is a UI component that contains a set of toggle buttons and can be used as a mode switcher.

Events.name: onContentReady
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component is rendered and each time the component is repainted.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onItemClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a button is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: onSelectionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed when a button is selected or selection is canceled.

Events.name: itemClick
Events.description: Raised when a button is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: selectionChanged
Events.description: Raised when a button is selected or selection is canceled.

Types.name: ContentReadyEvent
Types.description: The type of the [contentReady] event handler's argument.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemClickEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemClick] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: SelectionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [selectionChanged] event handler's argument.
